snippet: Monday’s highlights from around the web include an unexpected performance at Samsung’s press briefing at the Consumer Electronics Show. Plus, San Francisco’s mayor announced an initiative to make the operators of tech commuter buses pay the...
abstract: Monday’s highlights from around the web include an unexpected performance at Samsung’s press briefing at the Consumer Electronics Show. Plus, San Francisco’s mayor announced an initiative to make the operators of tech commuter buses pay the city for bus stop use.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Michael Bay's C.E.S. Performance, and Charging Tech Shuttles
